title: Automatic injection dependency list
body:
<!--
  Note: if the issue is about documentation or the website, please file it at:
  https://github.com/reactjs/reactjs.org/issues/new
-->

**Do you want to request a *feature* or report a *bug*?**
feature
**What is the current behavior?**
handwrite dependency list

```jsx
return useMemo(() => {
    const hostNodeClassNames = classNames({
        [styles.hostNode]: true,
        [styles.hostNodeSelected]: isSelected || isActive,
    });

    return (
        <g className={hostNodeClassNames}
            onClick={handleClick}
            onMouseDown={handleMouseDown}
            onMouseUp={handleMouseUp}
            onMouseEnter={handleMouseEnter}
            onMouseLeave={handleMouseLeave}
        >
            <circle className={styles.displayNode} cx={x} cy={y} r={radius}/>
            <circle className={styles.boundsNode} cx={x} cy={y} r={radius * 3}/>
        </g>
    );
}, [
    x,
    y,
    radius,
    isActive,
    isSelected,
    handleClick,
    handleMouseDown,
    handleMouseUp,
    handleMouseEnter,
    handleMouseLeave
]);
```

**What is the expected behavior?**
Automatic injection dependency list

```jsx
return useMemo(() => {
    const hostNodeClassNames = classNames({
        [styles.hostNode]: true,
        [styles.hostNodeSelected]: isSelected || isActive,
    });

    return (
        <g className={hostNodeClassNames}
            onClick={handleClick}
            onMouseDown={handleMouseDown}
            onMouseUp={handleMouseUp}
            onMouseEnter={handleMouseEnter}
            onMouseLeave={handleMouseLeave}
        >
            <circle className={styles.displayNode} cx={x} cy={y} r={radius}/>
            <circle className={styles.boundsNode} cx={x} cy={y} r={radius * 3}/>
        </g>
    );
});
```
